mapper.sql: id, code, register_source, tally_area_no, name, id_card_no, addr, trade_no, user_id, plate, state, sales_type, product_name, product_id, origin_id, origin_name, weight, detect_state, latest_detect_record_id, latest_detect_time, exe_machine_no, version, created, modified,latest_detect_operator,trade_account,operator_id,operator_name,latest_pd_result
mapper.update:
update register_bill
code = #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT},
register_source = #{registerSource,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tally_area_no = #{tallyAreaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_no = #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_account = #{tradeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plate = #{plate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
sales_type = #{salesType,jdbcType=BIT},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
origin_name = #{originName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detect_state = #{detectState,jdbcType=BIT},
latest_detect_record_id = #{latestDetectRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
latest_detect_time = #{latestDetectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exe_machine_no = #{exeMachineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_id = #{operator_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=TINYINT},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
latest_detect_operator = #{latestDetectOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id from register_bill where `trade_type_id` = #{tradeTypeId} and `product_name` = #{productName} and `id_card_no` = #{idCardNo} and `latest_detect_time` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND register_source = 2 AND trade_no IS NULL AND detect_state in(1,3) ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
mapper.update: update register_bill set `trade_no` = #{tradeNo},`weight` = #{weight} WHERE id = #{id} and (trade_no is NULL or trade_no='')
mapper.select: select id from register_bill where state = 4 and (exe_machine_no is null or exe_machine_no='') ORDER BY id ASC limit 0,#{taskCount}
mapper.update: update register_bill set `exe_machine_no` = #{exeMachineNo},state = 5 WHERE id IN (${ids}) and (exe_machine_no is null or exe_machine_no='')
